item.description:
We are young, creative, Boston-based and want to see your art. The spawn of Alicia Palleschi’s bored brain, Exposure Arts Boston is concerned with the huge amounts of untapped, latent creativity that lies in your roommates’ closet. Had Alicia and I not raided my own roommates’ closet one smoky afternoon, we would never have known what a brilliant and visionary painter she is. Then began the realization…

Our aim is to gather these unknown artists, expose their work, inspire anyone who’s interested, and generally give them an outlet unlike any others. We are college graduates, part-time workers, full-time workers, and undergraduates who simply would like to see more art at it’s most base level - pulled from that closet and displayed on our street corners. Please, join us. exposureartsboston@yahoo.com
item.name: Exposure Arts outdoor gallery
